metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10729 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Amanda 3.3.1. A user with backup privileges can trivially compromise a client installation. The "runtar" setuid root binary does not check for additional arguments supplied after --create, allowing users to manipulate commands and perform command injection as root.

criterions.comment: amanda package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
